name: Floral Sidewinder
description: After your Collei, who has this card equipped, uses Floral Brush, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: After your $[A1701], who has this card equipped, <color=#FFFFFFFF>uses $[S17012]</color>, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger $[K217]: Deal 1 $[K107]. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: After your Collei, who has this card equipped, <color=#FFFFFFFF>uses Floral Brush</color>, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger <color=#7EC236FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro-Related Reactions</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>. (Once per Round)
